name.name: Tissue Thickness Estimation via Minimum Line Integrals

software.description: This open-source toolbox contains Matlab codes for the estimation of tissue (such as cortical) thickness from soft segmentation of 3D medical images, using minimum line integrals as described by Aganj et al (HBM 2009). A short tutorial is included in EXAMPLE.m.
software.maintainer: University of Minnesota, and Harvard Medical School / MGH
